titleInfo.title: ‘Through Asiatic Turkey. Narrative of a journey from Bombay to the Bosphorus’

physicalDescription.extent: The volume contains a table of contents with chapter headings with page references (pp vii-xv). Each chapter heading is followed by a detailed breakdown of the contents of that chapter. There is also a list of illustrations giving titles and page references (p xvi).

mods.abstract: Through Asiatic Turkey. Narrative of a journey from Bombay to the Bosphorus, authored by Grattan Geary, editor of The Times of India.Publication details: Published by Sampson Low, Marston, Searle and Rivington, Crown Buildings, 188, Fleet Street, London.Physical description: Volume 1 of a two-volume work; includes map and illustrations; Octavo

name.namePart: Sampson Low, Marston, Searle and Rivington
